Game.Name: Mr. Incredible (Japan)
Game.plot: Superstrength, superspeed, invisibility, and elasticity are all the powers you have to combat evil in The Incredibles. You'll need them, because your enemies throw bombs, bullets, and lasers at you. Based on the movie from Pixar, The Incredibles tells the story of a family of undercover superheroes that is trying to live a quiet, suburban life but is forced back into action to save the world. As the film's main characters, you must fight, race, and solve puzzles in more than 18 action-packed levels.Cheat: Cheat PasswordsEnter this password in the password screen in the main menuCheat: Level PasswordsInput these in the password menu, on the main screen.Cheat: Level PasswordsEnter this at the password screen, in the main menu.Cheat: Level PasswordsEnter this password in the password screen in the main menu
